title_invitacion_comentar: Do not forget to leave a comment at the end of the tour
title_comentariosuccess: Comment added, thanks for your help
title_nocoordenadas: The coordinates were not detected, please slide the map to detect it
title_noregistros: There are no records in this area
title_avisocompra: Check the purchase before making the payment
title_add_tarjeta: Add a credit or debit card
title_question: What would you like to visit?
title_question_buy_tour: What i get if I buy the  tour?
title_card_not_funds: The card does not have enough funds
title_card_lost: The card has been identified as a stolen card
title_card_fraudulent: The card has been identified as a fraudulent card
title_operation_not_allowed: The operation is not allowed for this customer or this transaction
title_card_not_support_online: The card is not supported in online transactions
title_bank_restricted_card: The bank has restricted the card
title_card_withheld: The bank has requested that the card be withheld. Contact the bank
title_autorization_buy: It is required to ask the bank for authorization to make this payment
title_openpay_account_not_funds: The Openpay account does not have sufficient funds
title_error_server_openpay: An error occurred in the openpay server
title_operacion_not_complete: The operation could not be completed because the value of one or more of the parameters is not correct
title_service_not_enabled: A service required for transaction processing is not available
title_resource_not_disabled: One of the required resources does not exist
title_transaction_exist: A transaction with the same order ID already exists
title_transfer_not_acept: The transfer of funds between a bank or card account and the Openpay account was not accepted
title_account_desactivate: One of the accounts required in the petition is deactivated
title_require_more_long: The request body is too large
title_key_private: The public key is being used to make a call that requires the private key, or the private key is being used from JavaScript
title_account_registered: The bank account with this CLABE is already registered with the client
title_card_registered: The card with this number is already registered with the customer
title_client_exist: The client with this external identifier (External ID) already exists
title_digit_invalid: The verifying digit of the card number is invalid according to the Luhn algorithm
title_date_expired: The expiration date of the card is before the current date
title_code_security_empty: Card security code (CVV2) was not provided
title_card_test: The card number is test, it can only be used in Sandbox
title_card_not_points: The card consulted is not valid for points
title_card_not_valid: The card security code (CVV2) is not valid
title_correo_no_written: The mail is not well written
title_email_isready: Mail is already registered by another account
title_email_pass_no_enabled: The email or password are not valid
title_account_exist: This account already exists with a different credential
title_action_code_invalid: The action code in the link is malformed, expired, or has already been used
title_send_email: We send a message to the mail
